name: No Overflows
description:
Story

Queen Lalande has sent you an urgent message: "Cursed pearls all across the universe need to be captured and hidden away immediately!" So: Your task is to store as many pearls in various places/containers as possible. Luckily you have got the magic of the modern technology by your side, which makes the mission more bearable...

Game features

  • Loads of Zen-like design & eye bleach
  • Soothing background music/FX
  • 16 Hand crafted levels
  • Accelerometer based game controls*
  • Leaderboards/Achievements

*(This is actually one of the most funniest component of the game!)
